item.title: Cisco and Splunk Strengthen Enterprise Digital Resilience in the AI Era
item.description: Splunk announces innovations across its observability portfolio to provide organizations deeper visibility into their network health through integrations with Cisco, and faster troubleshooting with the help of AI.

item.title: Innovations in Splunk Security Expands Unified TDIR Experience to On-Premises and FedRamp Moderate Environments
item.description: Announcing the general availability of Splunk Enterprise Security 8.1, bringing unified TDIR workflows fueled by automation to both customer managed deployments and FedRAMP Moderate environments

item.title: Faster Insights with Third-Party LLM Services in Splunk Search
item.description: Splunker Greg Ainslie-Malik takes you through the steps to integrate LLM services with Splunk using MLTK 5.6 and provides use case ideas to get you started.

item.title: IT Event Analytics: The Complete Guide to Driving Efficiency, Security, and Insight from Your Event Data
item.description: Your definitive guide to IT event analytics: Master metrics, tools & best practices to drive efficiency, security, and actionable insights.

item.title: Data Centers Explained: Types, Features, and Choosing the Right Model
item.description: Discover what data centers are, their types (enterprise, cloud, colocation, edge), key components, locations, uses, and trends in energy efficiency and performance.

item.title: Unlock Context-Aware Network Observability with New AI and Integrations
item.description: Unlock context-aware network observability with Splunk's new AI and integrations.

item.title: Digital Resilience By Design: Seamless Troubleshooting Across Splunk & Cisco
item.description: Cisco and Splunk deliver Digital Resilience by Design with seamless troubleshooting across security, observability, and networking domains, powered by AI innovations to manage complexity and stay ahead of risk.

item.title: The Symphony of a Manufacturing Supply Chain
item.description: Gain real-time visibility into your manufacturing supply chain to help prevent disruptions, optimize logistics, and ensure on-time production with Splunk.

item.title: From Data Chaos to Clarity: Splunk and AWS Power AI Readiness in APAC
item.description: For over a decade, Splunk and AWS have worked together to help organisations make sense of their data — securely, at scale, and in real time.

item.title: What is Observability? An Introduction
item.description: In this blog post, we'll look at definitions, best practices, and key concepts around Observability in IT.

item.title: Telemetry 101: An Introduction To Telemetry
item.description: Telemetry is powerful data that can tell you all sorts of important information. Know what you can do with this useful data — get the full telemetry 101 here.
